function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increase in organic and inorganic waste due to online shopping and medical waste","Impact":"Environmental issues such as soil erosion, deforestation, and air and water pollution","Mitigation":"Encouraging sustainable packaging, promoting waste reduction, and implementing effective waste management systems","Technologies":"Biodegradable packaging materials, waste-to-energy technology, and smart waste management systems","People":"General population, waste management workers, environmental organizations","Owner":"Government, waste management companies, environmental organizations"},{"Description":"Reduction in waste recycling due to concerns about COVID-19 transmission","Impact":"Potential increase in pollution, energy consumption, and resource depletion","Mitigation":"Implementing safety protocols in recycling centers, promoting home recycling, and investing in innovative recycling technologies","Technologies":"Contactless recycling machines, waste sterilization technologies, and remote recycling monitoring systems","People":"Recycling center workers, general population, environmental organizations","Owner":"Government, recycling companies, environmental organizations"},{"Description":"Repeal of disposable bag bans leading to an increase in single-use plastic waste","Impact":"Exacerbation of environmental pollution, including land and water pollution","Mitigation":"Promoting reusable alternatives, enforcing sustainable packaging regulations, and raising public awareness about the environmental impact of single-use plastics","Technologies":"Reusable bag subsidies, biodegradable plastic alternatives, and smart packaging solutions","People":"General population, environmental organizations, retailers","Owner":"Government, retailers, environmental organizations"}]}
